quotes.quote: Learn to forgive fully and completely. If you want health, wealth, and happiness, you can't afford the luxury of lugging around all those unforgiven, unforgotten past events. Let them go.
The infliction of cruelty with a good conscience is a delight to moralists. That is why they invented Hell.
A bridge of silver wings stretches from the dead ashes of an unforgiving nightmare to the jeweled vision of a life started anew.
How ruthless and vile and hard and right the young are.
We must be ruthless with ideas, but gentle with people.
An unforgiving eye, and a damned disinheriting countenance!
Cruelty would be delicious if one could only find some sort of cruelty that didn't really hurt.
Whether fighting or spitting, my discipline is unforgiving!
In a cruel land, you either learned to laugh at cruelty or spent your life weeping.
When the cruel fall into the hands of the cruel, we read their fate with horror, not with pity.
The most ruthless of all humans are the ones cornered in by death.
Some things are not forgiveable. Deliberate cruelty is not forgiveable. It is the most unforgiveable thing in my opinion, and the one thing in which I have never, ever been guilty.
I was tough. I used everything to my advantage. I could be very ruthless.
Nature is cold, wet, hard and unforgiving.
Probably human cruelty is fixed and eternal. Only styles change.
Cruelty towards others is always also cruelty towards ourselves.
Unforgiveness is spiritual filthiness, so get washed in the water of God's Word to forgive and stay clean.
Deliberate cruelty is unforgivable.
Competition-ruthless, unforgiving, to-the-death competition-is a crucial feature of capitalism.
It's best to be ruthless with the past
Ruthless striving, overcomes everything.
Cruelty ever proceeds from a vile mind, and often from a cowardly heart.
Cruelty is the first attribute of the devil.
And his unkindness may defeat my life, But never taint my love.
This is a ruthless world and one must be ruthless to cope with it.
The only unforgivable sin: Being unforgiving.
A ruthless man extends his ruthlessness from those he does not love to those he loves.
This is the pain-pleasure of having newly adult children; they're innocent and ruthless in forgetting their sweet old dependence.
To withhold forgiveness is to take poison and expect the unforgiven to die.
The unforgivable crime is soft hitting. Do not hit at all if it can be avoided; but never hit softly
